attributes.action: Persuade the Queen to go ahead with the gun salute.
attributes.additional_details:
Because every nation has traditions that define its character. This a tradition that marks the grace, life Of service and fortitude of our monarchs. 

The monarchs every word and action has so far created hope and good cheer. The gun salute is part of that hope. Ask her to do it to mark the fact that we will overcome this virus. But it must go ahead.
attributes.background: Persuade our beloved Queen to carry on with the gun salute on her birthday. The nation needs to hold on to some its traditions. It gives people hope  and conveys all is not lost to coronavirus. The virus has not won!

rejection.details: This was a decision for the Queen, not the UK Government or Parliament.
